items.title: Personalized Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history, accessible only to authenticated users.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users
Recommendations update in real-time based on the user's recent interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline
Recommendations are not displayed to unauthenticated users
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data availability
non_functional: System must handle concurrent requests from up to 10,000 users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA
Authentication process must not exceed 2 seconds for 95% of login attempts

notes: Assumed that the platform already has user accounts, product catalog, and tracking of user interactions. Further clarification needed on the AI model type and data sources. Added authentication requirement per feedback.
